rules_text:
Miracle {3}{W} [i](You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
When Honorable Descendant enters the battlefield, if it was cast for its miracle cost, create two 1/1 red and white Soldier creature tokens.
At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if you control three or more tapped creatures.
